column1: 1 0 1 Hi. I'm OK. How are you?  EOS 1 1 2 [Others] I'm OK as well.  EOS 1 0 3 so I have a person at my work that likes/wants to do my job.  EOS 1 0 4 they often do something that I was responsible for or I needed to do.  EOS 1 1 5 [Question] How do you feel when that happens?  EOS 1 0 6 I upsets me a lot  EOS 1 1 7 [Affirmation and Reassurance] That can be really frustrating.  EOS 1 1 8 [Question] What do you do when it happens?

0 0 25 im just so lost  EOS 0 1 26 [Self-disclosure] I can understand where you are coming from. I have been in that situation myself and it is not an easy place to be. For me, it took some time to accept that I deserved better than someone who didn't just want me. Is that how you feel?  EOS 0 0 27 kind of  EOS 0 1 28 [Affirmation and Reassurance] Understandably so. I believe that this is just temporary and you will be amazed at how strong you are.  EOS 0 0 29 you think so?  EOS 0 1 30 [Providing Suggestions] If you are leaning toward not accepting not being enough for him, then I would suggest an exit plan. Call a family member, or friend, to see if you can stay there awhile. Have a cooling off period from your husband and reassess the situation  EOS 0 0 31 ok. ill consider that  EOS 0 0 32 thank you so much  EOS 0 0 33 this has been going on for half a year  EOS 0 1 34 [Affirmation and Reassurance] I absolutely do. We normally find out that we are actually much stronger than we give ourselves credit for.

5 0 0 hello  EOS 5 1 1 [Question] Hello. How are you?  EOS 5 0 2 I need to confide on someone, I just need to say it out so I can be relieve  EOS 5 0 3 we met on instagram  EOS 5 1 4 [Affirmation and Reassurance] Sure, you can tell me anything. I won't judge or anything like that.

0 0 8 Here! Last Christmas I bought the condo of my dreams. This April 2020 I lost my job due Covid 19. My unemployment is ending and my savings are depleted. I've recived an eviction notice and don't know what to do. Help!  EOS 0 0 9 Have you ever been evicted?  EOS 0 1 10 [Others] Where are you that you are able to be evicted?  EOS 0 1 11 [Providing Suggestions] You should not be able to be evicted from your home during this time in pretty much every state. Have you tried contacting anyone for help other than your landlord?  EOS 0 0 12 I'm still in my condo but I no longer have a job, umemployment has run out and my savings are all gone.  EOS 0 1 13 [Providing Suggestions] Well the plus side is they cannot kick you out right now. Have you talk to your landlord about working out some payment arrangement. Have you tried applying for any job? Now is not the time for pride to get in the way, i would accept anything  EOS 0 0 14 When you say work out a plan what do you mean? I have no job. I have been applying for jobs but I haven't received a callback or an offer of employment. Have you ever been in this situation?  EOS 0 0 15 Also, I'm calling a helpline so Pride is not my issue.  EOS 0 1 16 [Others] I have but the referendum on evictions with covid makes this situation different. I am sorry if that pride comment came off as crass. I was just trying to say desperate times come with desperate measures  EOS 0 1 17 [Providing Suggestions] They could work out a way you can pay extra monthly when you get back on your feet.

3 0 8 Hmm, I'm finding it hard to remember a time I didn't feel like this! I feel like this has been going on forever! I used to enjoy walking, and generally getting things done around the house. I am also self employed and loved putting time into my business but I've been finding that hard recently.  EOS 3 0 9 I've been watching a lot of Netflix and youtube and not doing much else.  EOS 3 1 10 [Self-disclosure] I have been spending a lot of time home by myself as well.  EOS 3 0 11 How do you cope with it? How do you not get bored and restless?  EOS 3 1 12 [Providing Suggestions] I noticed if I try to adhere to a schedule, even a very simple one, such as getting up at a certain time, making breakfast, and showering. My days tend to go better.  EOS 3 0 13 I've been finding I have a lot of time alone with my thoughts recently.  EOS 3 0 14 That's a good idea, I could try that. At the moment I get up at around 11am but U have been trying to get up earlier but I just can't make myself do it. I've also been sleeping during the day which is maybe not good.  EOS 3 1 15 [Question] Have you tried reading? I find reading motivates me sometimes, too. Sometimes too much thinking alone leaves me digging a hole for myself.  EOS 3 0 16 I used to get a lot of pleasure from reading and would always have a book on the go. Now reading feels like a chore, as if I am making myself do it.  EOS 3 1 17 [Self-disclosure] I sometimes force myself to exercise when I get sleepy when I shouldn't be tired during the day.

0 1 21 [Reflection of feelings] that has to be a horrible feeling to be in such a hostile work environment. do you have coworkers who would be willing to back you up?  EOS 0 1 22 [Information] there's definitely power in numbers!  EOS 0 0 23 maybe, i'm not sure. it feels like everyone is afraid of my manager but yet no one will speak up  EOS 0 1 24 [Providing Suggestions] if it's really that bad is there a way to get a transfer?  EOS 0 0 25 i have considered it, but due to the pandemic, everything is on freeze  EOS 0 1 26 [Reflection of feelings] yes and that just makes things so much worse.  EOS 0 0 27 i'm withdrawing from the work and that's bad. i still care about the work, but the toxic environment is messing with me mentally  EOS 0 1 28 [Providing Suggestions] maybe seek out someone more senior in a different department who can help  EOS 0 0 29 that's a good idea!  EOS 0 1 30 [Self-disclosure] When I had a toxic manager I went in and did my work and kept to myself as much as possible. But it does help to have allies throughout the company too!

4 0 1 I'M PASSING THROUGH DEPRESSION  EOS 4 1 2 [Affirmation and Reassurance] That sounds really rough. When did this begin?  EOS 4 0 3 TODAY  EOS 4 0 4 I LOST A VERY DEAR FRIEND  EOS 4 1 5 [Reflection of feelings] I am so sorry to hear this! Losing a close friend can be very difficult.Communicating your feelings is a step in the right direction to cope with your emotions.  EOS 4 0 6 i dont know how i can get over ,its heart breaking since i heard about the sad news of his demise  EOS 4 0 7 have been taking Alcohol since to wipe away the emotion but its seems its getting more complicated  EOS 4 1 8 [Question] I can tell you are very sad about this situation and understandably so. It seems as if alcohol is your coping mechanism right now correct? Do you have close friends to share your emotions with?

0 1 10 [Self-disclosure] Oh God, I can understand you! that's a lot of pressuare  EOS 0 0 11 yes it is!  EOS 0 0 12 Should I keep studying or try and get some rest?  EOS 0 1 13 [Providing Suggestions] Well, I think you should take a rest time from your works and take that time to study a lot.  EOS 0 0 14 my test is tomorrow! I'm not working right now, I'm studying  EOS 0 1 15 [Affirmation and Reassurance] Yes of course, You can do it and keeping studying to do your best in the exam  EOS 0 1 16 [Providing Suggestions] OHHHH!!!! well, you can take a rest like 20 or 30 minutes to desestress yourself and then continuing studying all night  EOS 0 0 17 how do I take some pressure off myself?  EOS 0 0 18 that's a good idea!  EOS 0 1 19 [Affirmation and Reassurance] after the exam your pressure will be less than now

0 0 0 Hello there  EOS 0 1 1 [Question] Hello! How are you doing today?  EOS 0 0 2 Not too bad. Been experiencing some anxiety though. It is kind of an ongoing issue for me  EOS 0 1 3 [Affirmation and Reassurance] Anxiety can be a real challenge. What have you done to face it in the past that works for you?  EOS 0 0 4 I have tried going to support groups and therapy. I also take medications. Despite this I still feel overwhelmed.  EOS 0 1 5 [Question] It sounds like you have tried a lot of different methods, so good for you for taking care of yourself. What is overwhelming you?

6 0 17 O nvm it says we have to do this for 15 minutes lol  EOS 6 1 18 [Providing Suggestions] Well, erm, thank you and a very Merry Christmas to you too. Yes fifteen minutes :D. Have you thought of making a list of goals for the New Year to motivate yourself?  EOS 6 0 19 Yea I have been smoking cigarettes for to long all bs aside.. Im going really try to get out of the habit of it this year. hopefully get out of where im staying to.. to a bigger place  EOS 6 1 20 [Self-disclosure] I smoke too much too. It costs a lot and it's really bad for my health. I think I am gonna try and quit - again, sigh - in January too  EOS 6 0 21 try not to shame my friends or enemies any. do something good for someone this year I hope to.. try to at least.. hehe i said on my birthday which was the end of november i was quitting i really need try harder and do it  EOS 6 1 22 [Providing Suggestions] Maybe try saving the money you save on cigarettes for a few months and then treat yourself to something really nice?  EOS 6 0 23 ya cigarettes they getting up much a pack they really are a waste of money. especially if you dont have alot of money like me  EOS 6 0 24 ya Im really going to try  EOS 6 0 25 total waste of money make you smell bad  EOS 6 1 26 [Self-disclosure] Nearly ten pounds a pack here (UK). I am gonna try and save up for a new handbag!

3 1 26 [Self-disclosure] I personally plan on getting myself vaccinated as soon as I can  EOS 3 0 27 are you believing our government too bad..  EOS 3 1 28 [Others] That comes down to personal opinion, and is important that we respect each other choices  EOS 3 1 29 [Question] Is there any other concern that I might help you with today?  EOS 3 0 30 Do you like movies?  EOS 3 1 31 [Self-disclosure] Sometimes, as a way to distract myself yes  EOS 3 0 32 I love to watch movies horror movies.  EOS 3 1 33 [Affirmation and Reassurance] If it helps you to get distracted and provides you with joy, absolutely!  EOS 3 0 34 Do you smoke and drink alcohol?  EOS 3 1 35 [Self-disclosure] No, I don't find that to be healthy, and I don't enjoy them.

3 1 25 [Others] That's horrible.  EOS 3 1 26 [Question] Have you been able to talk to friends about it?  EOS 3 0 27 No, that’s why I’m talking to u  EOS 3 0 28 I haven’t been able to eat or sleep in a few days  EOS 3 1 29 [Question] Do you have any friends who you can talk to it about it? Some people around you who know you really well?  EOS 3 0 30 No he was my everything  EOS 3 1 31 [Providing Suggestions] You definitely need to eat and sleep even though you don't feel like it. You have to take care of yourself even though it feels hard.  EOS 3 1 32 [Affirmation and Reassurance] Guys are a dime a dozen. I don't know what that really means but I think it has something to do with being able to get guys easily.  EOS 3 0 33 I know..it’s hard when everything reminds me of him  EOS 3 1 34 [Affirmation and Reassurance] I think if you really focus on what you need right now, you'll be able to realize that you dodged a bullet. You don't want to be with a cheater. you should want to be with someone who respects you and treats you well

6 1 1 [Question] Hello there. How are you feeling today?  EOS 6 0 2 Im feeling a little down  EOS 6 1 3 [Question] I am really sorry to hear that. Is it something specific that you'd like to talk about?  EOS 6 0 4 Yes I am being dismissed from medical school  EOS 6 1 5 [Others] I am really sorry to hear that! Is it related to the pandemic or have you doing badly in your exams?  EOS 6 0 6 i am currently in the appeals process but i havent left the house in a weeks  EOS 6 0 7 yes my child was having suicidal thoughts so my attention went there  EOS 6 1 8 [Affirmation and Reassurance] Please try not to worry. Do you have someone to advocate for you in the appeals process?  EOS 6 0 9 no its all on me  EOS 6 1 10 [Information] I think you should look into getting an advocate. You have a legal entitlement to have representation.

4 0 9 Basically she can only have 7 grams of protein a day.  EOS 4 0 10 If she gets more. That could result in severe brain damage.  EOS 4 1 11 [Others] And is this something that she will die early because of?  EOS 4 0 12 Not exactly.  EOS 4 0 13 It just means her liver can't metabolize three amino acids.  EOS 4 1 14 [Information] So if she manages it she can live a relatively normal life?  EOS 4 0 15 Yes, for the most part. She still gets very clumsy and can is very prone to sickness getting very bad.  EOS 4 0 16 So it has it's challenges.  EOS 4 0 17 I just keep hearing about gene therapy for that I'm just at the point where I'm not I could go on if something horrible happens.  EOS 4 1 18 [Reflection of feelings] Sure, I can see where it would be challenging and pregnancy would be scary. But I'd suggest discuss it with her doctor to see what they suggest.

0 0 0 Hello  EOS 0 0 1 Are you able to see my situation I typed?  EOS 0 0 2 Is there someone there?  EOS 0 1 3 [Affirmation and Reassurance] Sorry I'm here, please tell me you problems  EOS 0 0 4 Just having problems with some friends. I feel like I am being left out.  EOS 0 1 5 [Question] Why do you think that way?

0 0 25 Yes being an adult is difficult, but life is hard in general.  EOS 0 1 26 [Information] Have you tried using scripts like hit forker and jr panda crazy? They are basically extensions that help to pick up the higher paying hits for you. I use it myself and it's very helpful!  EOS 0 1 27 [Information] There are lots of Youtube videos that show you how to use them.  EOS 0 0 28 I've never heard of it and I don't know what that is.  EOS 0 0 29 Thank you I will look into it.  EOS 0 0 30 I do surveys on swagbucks and that earns gift cards.  EOS 0 0 31 its not a lot, but still anything helps.  EOS 0 1 32 [Providing Suggestions] You are very welcome! You could also try going to temp agencies to find employment. They typically set you up with work that you can start almost immediately if not immediately.  EOS 0 0 33 You give great advice!  EOS 0 1 34 [Providing Suggestions] I try. I was working at a bookstore at minimum wage for 2 years so I totally understand where you are coming from and had coworkers that also had kids. The best advice I can give is to continue to put yourself out there and take opportunities as they come even if they are short term because the more experience you have, the easier it is to find a better job even during the pandemic.

0 0 0 Hello.  EOS 0 0 1 I am so worried about losing my job.  EOS 0 1 2 [Information] Hello! How are you today?  EOS 0 1 3 [Question] You are feeling anxious about the future?  EOS 0 0 4 I am doing so-so. I just found out that my company was going to be using the new round of the paycheck protection from the stimulus to pay us. Now that didn't get afford and I think we will be laid off on Monday.  EOS 0 1 5 [Affirmation and Reassurance] Ok. You are making some assumptions on information you have about your company. Remember that you may not know the whole story.  EOS 0 1 6 [Self-disclosure] I, too, have made assumptions that affection my outlook and caused anxiety.  EOS 0 1 7 [Self-disclosure] My assumptions were often wrong.  EOS 0 0 8 Well they sent out a email letting us know of the situation. SO I am also sure it is going to happen. I'm not sure how to let my family know.  EOS 0 1 9 [Providing Suggestions] Ok. Have you thought about a plan? When you tell your family, it may help to state your planned actions. This may help with feelings of uncertainty, both theirs and yours.

4 0 5 It is over permanently...  EOS 4 1 6 [Self-disclosure] Maybe it is for the best - I have been cheated on before and although it hurt at the time it turned out to be the best favour he could have done me.  EOS 4 0 7 Yeah I guess, the relationship was a little toxic and she sometimes only used me for money.  EOS 4 0 8 Maybe is it for the best now that I think about it.  EOS 4 1 9 [Others] Sounds like you're definitely well off out of that one!!  EOS 4 0 10 Yeah I just miss having someone there for me.  EOS 4 1 11 [Providing Suggestions] All you need now is to give yourself some TLC .. treat yourself to something nice and go easy on yourself.  EOS 4 0 12 What is TLC  EOS 4 1 13 [Self-disclosure] There will be someone else. I never thought I'd find anyone else but I did and we've been together ten years ago now!  EOS 4 1 14 [Information] Tender Loving Care :) Means be good to yourself

0 0 26 definitely that makes sense  EOS 0 1 27 [Self-disclosure] He feared I would die or leave him or something, but once he saw that, and realized what he was doing was hurting me and making me want to leave, he changed. But honestly, I have never understood men and why they dont' see life the way we do. Sometimes it takes that objective person to help them see it.  EOS 0 0 28 I'm not convinced mine loves me, looking back it's beginning to seem like he was draining me for my income and labor  EOS 0 1 29 [Reflection of feelings] Ouch! That sounds painful to look at.  EOS 0 0 30 it is, I think I was super wrong about him and overlooked red flags  EOS 0 1 31 [Information] People who truly love others become willing to change. Sometimes it takes a DRASTIC measure to wake them up, like leaving. He has not heard you, so many he will "hear" it when you leave. But please be careful and have a plan.  EOS 0 1 32 [Question] How long have you been married?  EOS 0 0 33 eight years, together for 11  EOS 0 1 34 [Others] That's a long time. I will say a prayer for your safety and for you to get some help, hopefully he will join you. Marriage is a lot of work, but it can't be one person, it has to be two.  EOS 0 1 35 [Providing Suggestions] Don't leave anything in writing around until after you leave.

0 0 11 I have been really upset as people from my study group dont respond to my emails  EOS 0 1 12 [Providing Suggestions] I am sorry to hear that and know that could make you really sad. Do you have a relationship with a professor at your school? One that you can talk to about your feelings?  EOS 0 0 13 I dont have a professor i can trust or feel comfortable taking to  EOS 0 0 14 I also dont have any family  EOS 0 0 15 i have general anxiety disorder  EOS 0 1 16 [Information] Okay, I can understand your feelings. Have you heard of practice tests?  EOS 0 0 17 i couldnt study because I have chronic pain issues  EOS 0 1 18 [Providing Suggestions] I have experienced a little bit of what you are describing and I am so happy that you have reached out regardless of your obstacles. Have you ever tried to write down what you're feeling?  EOS 0 0 19 i have never tries writing down my feelings  EOS 0 1 20 [Providing Suggestions] I think it can help release feelings and help ground people. Do you have family that has experienced what you are feeling or been through college o a scholarship? I would suggest reaching out to family in the case of feeling anxiety.

4 1 20 [Affirmation and Reassurance] yea it sucks that unknown and not knowing enough  EOS 4 0 21 i need to exercise, havent done that yet.  EOS 4 1 22 [Providing Suggestions] exercise is great for the mind take a walk or jog a hike in nature or a park  EOS 4 0 23 yes, the would make me feel better. i like playing volleyball. but its hard to do that these days  EOS 4 1 24 [Providing Suggestions] yea try to do something like that tomorrow and ah i love volley ball but yea thats hard now  EOS 4 0 25 my favorite sport  EOS 4 0 26 i will try  EOS 4 1 27 [Others] great sport for sure and yea you got this just remember it will help  EOS 4 0 28 i feel better already  EOS 4 1 29 [Others] awesome im glad

6 0 13 I have a couch to crash on. Another guy said I could store my furniture in his basement. But no official room.  EOS 6 1 14 [Providing Suggestions] It's a precarious position to be in, especially during a pandemic. Do you have any family members who might help?  EOS 6 0 15 Yes, I could call my mother. She has a room to stay in. But I only have the money to drive to her home, not the money for a rental truck to move all my stuff.  EOS 6 1 16 [Question] Would any family members be prepared to loan you money or a vehicle?  EOS 6 0 17 I could ask my aunt to use her car, she has an SUV, where as I drive a sedan.  EOS 6 1 18 [Others] How much stuff do you have that needs to be moved?  EOS 6 0 19 Queen bed, bed frame, small desk, roll chair, bookshelf, rug, boxes of kitchen stuff, etc.  EOS 6 1 20 [Self-disclosure] Try not to worry too much - I was in this position once myself and it did all turn out for the best though it was very scary at the time.  EOS 6 0 21 Yes, I feel almost numb from the depression. Like non of my stuff matters, only that I am physically safe.  EOS 6 1 22 [Others] I think it would be a good idea for you to try and get medical help for your depression.

7 1 13 [Affirmation and Reassurance] Yes, thats the spirit it works for me!  EOS 7 0 14 I will give it a try!  EOS 7 1 15 [Others] Okay is there anything else I can help you with or should I let you go?  EOS 7 0 16 No, I should go study now. thank you for your help.  EOS 7 1 17 [Others] Of course anytime, have a goodnight!  EOS 7 0 18 You too!  EOS 7 0 19 Wait! I have another concern.  EOS 7 1 20 [Question] Yes, what is that?  EOS 7 0 21 Do you have any tips for staying cool under pressure while I am taking my exam?  EOS 7 1 22 [Affirmation and Reassurance] Yes I do actually. First make sure you get a good nights sleep so your brain can rest and function at its best. Next get to class a little early so you have time to soak up the energy in the room and you get a sense of your surroundings. Take it easy and do not rush. Just one question at a time, next thing you know its over.
1 0 1 hello im looking for someone to talk to  EOS 1 0 2 im fine how are you  EOS 1 1 3 [Question] I'm doing ok I'm glad you are good. Is it snowing by you?  EOS 1 1 4 [Others] Merry Christmas!

4 0 1 Hi. Yes, I'm having a hard time because last year my dad died a few days after Christmas.  EOS 4 1 2 [Others] Oh I am so sorry! Dealing with bereavement is hard at any time but at this time of year I think that it is even worse.  EOS 4 0 3 When people ask about Christmas plans, I don't want to depress everyone. But I can't pretend everything's okay.  EOS 4 1 4 [Reflection of feelings] So you feel as though you have to avoid people because you do not want to make them feel bad that you are feeling bad?  EOS 4 0 5 I don't know... I know my friends would be supportive. But then I feel like it's selfish of me to bring people down, when this whole year has been a downer for so many of us.  EOS 4 1 6 [Question] Well let me ask you - if the situation were reversed, would you feel that a close friend was bringing you down if they talked about their bereavement?  EOS 4 0 7 Maybe, but I wouldn't mind that.  EOS 4 1 8 [Reflection of feelings] Well, perhaps your friends would not mind you confiding in them either? That is what good friends are for, ultimately.

4 0 7 yes, often  EOS 4 0 8 but she won't go for help, so i have had to be exceedingly patient  EOS 4 1 9 [Restatement or Paraphrasing] I love your patience level and would like to keep it going.  EOS 4 1 10 [Reflection of feelings] Patience is the key and she will understand eventually. She will be ready to take help.  EOS 4 0 11 i will but it's such a heavy burden to carry. i try not to think about it much, but I carry it, you know? I Hope you are right about her wanting help eventually  EOS 4 0 12 in the meantime I don't know how to be so sad about this, maybe there is no way  EOS 4 1 13 [Providing Suggestions] I understand your heavy burden however some kids face these problems and we as parents guide them so that they come out with flying colors.  EOS 4 0 14 indeed. and i have been holding up my end of the bargain. but it's so worrisome.  EOS 4 0 15 it sounds like you are encouraging me to have hope against all odds?  EOS 4 1 16 [Self-disclosure] You are a warrior and you need to fight off the worrisome and motivate yourself to help you kiddo.

3 0 2 oh hello  EOS 3 0 3 I'm having problems with friends - or more precisely the lack of them. I don't have any.  EOS 3 1 4 [Restatement or Paraphrasing] Oh I see. You feel as though you don't have any friend's currently? I totally get that. I feel like that a lot too, especially in these weird times we are going through. It's so hard to see people and keep relationships right now  EOS 3 0 5 Well it's more that I think I've never had friends. Not anyone I can confide in or laugh with  EOS 3 1 6 [Affirmation and Reassurance] That's a really hard thing to be going through. I'm sorry to hear that. Do you have any really close family members that you are able to confide in?

4 1 3 [Reflection of feelings] oh, what happened? why are you sad?  EOS 4 0 4 I think I am just feeling down because of the pandemic  EOS 4 1 5 [Self-disclosure] ok, i understand. this pandemic has been really tough.  EOS 4 1 6 [Affirmation and Reassurance] have you tried to take your mind off of the pandemic by spending time on your hobbies?  EOS 4 0 7 I have but they aren't the same without my friends  EOS 4 1 8 [Information] that's true. times like these really show us the value of our friends. have you talked to your friends recently? either in person or through phone/video calls?  EOS 4 0 9 We have done a few video calls but it just makes me more sad that I can't see them in person  EOS 4 1 10 [Information] okay. at lease seeing them in the video should have brought you some relief. Are you planning to get vaccinated when you are able to? And what about your friends? once you are vaccinated, it will help you meet your friends in person.  EOS 4 0 11 Yes we are planning to get it as soon as possible but that is hard in our state  EOS 4 1 12 [Providing Suggestions] oh okay. Have you tried checking with your friends to see if you could meet in person but still maintain social distance and wear masks, etc.

0 0 6 I've been looking at other companies, but learning a new system after all these years is difficult.  EOS 0 1 7 [Self-disclosure] I remember a time I lost my job and felt my whole world crumbling but then I realized when one door closes another door opens. when those doors close it seems that its usually for the best because it opens the path for something bigger and greater for you.  EOS 0 0 8 That's true. I've thought about looking into new fields.  EOS 0 1 9 [Providing Suggestions] Have you looked into some evening classes or maybe online schooling? I hear there are so many different options when it comes to online learning.  EOS 0 0 10 I was looking into that last night, but with covid, classes have had to cut enrollment and are already full for next semester.  EOS 0 1 11 [Providing Suggestions] They are full? well what about surrounding towns? Have you sat down and really thought about your passions and what you enjoy doing? Maybe theres an elderly person who needs some companionship or something like that in town for the time being.  EOS 0 0 12 I don't have a car, so I'm stuck doing classes locally. I think I'll just have to wait for the next semester.  EOS 0 1 13 [Question] Is waiting until next semester something your willing to do? That would give you time to reflect on yourself and your future and figure out what you want to do as a career. I could give you a list of other online opportunities to make money if you would be interested.  EOS 0 0 14 I would be interested in that, thank you.  EOS 0 1 15 [Others] your welcome. There are a lot of online options out there. That may be easier for you at the time being without a car. Do you have a support system of family or friends around here?

3 1 13 [Reflection of feelings] I can understand that would make you feel anxious and depressed.  EOS 3 1 14 [Question] Do you have someone to help you cope with this situation? Friends, Family, etc?  EOS 3 0 15 what would u do or how would u feel if u was in this situation? i ended up getting back with him bc i didnt want my child without a father like i was  EOS 3 1 16 [Affirmation and Reassurance] I totally understand where you are coming from.  EOS 3 1 17 [Information] Things get much more complicated when children are involved.  EOS 3 0 18 nope i keep to myself! and alot of friends and family dont even know shes pregnant with his kid yet, but yes at the time i had help  EOS 3 0 19 yes it does get alot more complicated exp when my kid is involed and then i have to thing about him not being himself bc of his tbo  EOS 3 1 20 [Providing Suggestions] Well, it sounds like you still have a lot going on. Sometimes even when you want to take more on emotionally and mentally you need to take a step back and re-evaluate the situation.  EOS 3 1 21 [Providing Suggestions] Maybe finding someone to talk to about everything that is currently going on in your life would be helpful.  EOS 3 1 22 [Reflection of feelings] Youre only human, right?

1 0 0 Hello there.  EOS 1 1 1 [Question] Good evening . How can I help you  EOS 1 0 2 I'm having a problem with one of my friends.  EOS 1 1 3 [Question] So you are having issues with your friend? That is upsetting . What is the issue?  EOS 1 0 4 She has been having a problem with a different friend for years. I have been listening to these problems for all of that time. And even though it's so frustrating, because it's the same problem over and over again, I keep listening because she's my friend. But lately I have been going through a lot, and I haven't had as much time to sit and listen to these same problems, and she gets so angry telling me I don't care about her. The problems I've been going through are very serious, and I just don't have time to sit on the phone listening to the same stuff I've been dealing with for years.  EOS 1 1 5 [Reflection of feelings] I can understand how angry unappreciated and burnt out you must be feeling. I would feel that way too
